name: MALLARD REACTION
description:
Mallard Reaction! Created for Ludum Dare Dare 37 (Theme: One Room). Includes .mfa source file for Clickteam Fusion 2.5

Controls
- Arrow keys - Move
- Shift - Chop
- Spacebar - Jump

Completion stats
- Jam Length - 48 hours(10th Dec - 12th Dec)
- Development Length - ~24 hours

Version Information
- v1.01 - Fixed scoring back, added more FX on death
- v1.00 - First version (submitted for Ludum Dare #37)
